Collaborate with larger Meta Reality Labs Research team to explore novel solution space for AR/VR devices. Explore the application of at least one of the following: geometrical optics, diffraction optics, polarization optics, illumination, optical system design. This position will have an emphasis of advanced simulations and prototyping to prove new concepts and the perceptual impact of those concepts.
